page.title: Connection List
page.noConnectionsDescription: Create a new connection to help you integrate with other services

toast.refreshNotImplemented: Refresh functionality is not implemented yet

detail.title: Detail Connection
detail.noRobotsDescription: Publish a robot from your existing processes.

moodle.title: Create Moodle Connection
moodle.description: Connect to your Moodle site using a Web Service Token. You can generate this token from your Moodle site's administration panel.
moodle.tokenPlaceholder: Enter your Moodle web service token
moodle.tokenHelp: This token will be securely stored and encrypted
moodle.name: Connection Name
moodle.nameHelp: Leave empty to auto-detect from your Moodle site

validation.urlInvalid: Must be a valid URL (e.g., https://moodle.example.com)
validation.urlProtocol: URL must start with http:// or https://
validation.tokenMin: Token must be at least 10 characters
validation.nameMax: Name must be less than 100 characters
